_comments.listen_ip: IP address to bind the HTTP server. Use 0.0.0.0 for all interfaces, 127.0.0.1 for local-only, or your Tailscale IP (e.g., 100.64.x.x) for Tailnet-only access.
_comments.listen_port: TCP port for the hub HTTP server. Default 8080. Change if another service uses this port.
_comments.auth_token: Shared secret for authenticating agent requests. MUST match the auth_token in each agent's config. Use a long, random string (e.g., openssl rand -hex 32). Can also be set via TAILCLIP_HUB_AUTH_TOKEN env var.
_comments.sqlite_path: File path for the SQLite database. Stores clipboard events and device registrations. Relative paths are relative to the working directory.
_comments.history_limit: Maximum number of clipboard events to retain in the database. Prevents unbounded storage growth.
_comments.retention_days: Number of days to keep clipboard history before automatic deletion. Balances privacy with history availability.
